components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delay To Multiple Network In Colombia Over A Subset Of Short Code

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple Network In Colombia Over A Subset Of Short Code. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in the next 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to multiple Network In Colombia Over A Subset Of Short Code. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in the next 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body:

Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To Telenor Network In Pakistan.

incident_updates.body:
We are still experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telenor Network in Pakistan. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are no longer experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Zong Network in Pakistan.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Iraq SMS Carrier Maintenance - Multiple Carrier

incident_updates.body:
Multiple networks in Iraq is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 21 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 02 July 2024 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Multiple Carrier Iraq handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

21 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 21 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
22 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 22 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
